title: First days
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Education - South Australia

description: Looks at a school in South Australia where a policy of continuous admission is in operation. Shows the ways in which the parents and the new child are put at ease by the principal and class. Indicates the sorts of adjustments required from both the new student and the teachers. Also looks at vertical and small groups, open plan classrooms and parental involvement. Written by Terry Jennings.
